verses.name: 2 Kings 23:31
verses.text: Jehoahaz was twenty and three years old when he began to reign; and he reigned three months in Jerusalem. And his mother’s name was Hamutal, the daughter of Jeremiah of Libnah.

verses.name: 2 Kings 23:32
verses.text: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, according to all that his fathers had done.

verses.name: 2 Kings 23:33
verses.text: And Pharaoh–nechoh put him in bands at Riblah in the land of Hamath, that he might not reign in Jerusalem; and put the land to a tribute of an hundred talents of silver, and a talent of gold.
